name: fuel_type_code
desc: The type of alternative fuel the station provides. Fuel types are given as code values as described below:

name: station_name
desc: The name of the station.

name: street_address
desc: The street address of the station's location.

name: intersection_directions
desc: Brief additional information about how to locate the station.

name: city
desc: The city of the station's location.

name: state
desc: The two character code for the U.S. state or Canadian province/territory of the station's location.

name: zip
desc: The ZIP code (postal code) of the station's location.

name: station_phone
desc: The phone number of the station.

name: status_code
desc: The current status of the station, given as code values as described below:

name: groups_with_access_code
desc: Deprecated: See the

name: access_days_time
desc: Hours of operation for the station.

name: cards_accepted
desc: A space-separated list of payment methods accepted. Payment methods are given as code values as described below:

name: ev_level1_evse_num
desc: For electric stations, the number of Level 1 EVSE ports.

name: ev_level2_evse_num
desc: For electric stations, the number of Level 2 EVSE ports.

name: ev_network
desc: For electric stations, the name of the EV charging network, if applicable.

name: ev_network_web
desc: For electric stations, the EV charging network Web site, if applicable.

name: geocode_status
desc: A rating indicating the approximate accuracy of the latitude and longitude for the station's address, given as code values as described below:

name: latitude
desc: The latitude of the station's address (see the "Geocode Status" field for details on the latitude's accuracy).

name: longitude
desc: The longitude of the station's address (see the "Geocode Status" field for details on the longitude's accuracy).

name: date_last_confirmed
desc: The date the station's details were last confirmed.

name: id
desc: A unique identifier for this specific station.

name: updated_at
desc: The time the station's details were last updated (

name: owner_type_code
desc: The type of organization that owns the fueling infrastructure. Owner types are given as code values as described below:

name: open_date
desc: The date that the station began offering the fuel. Note that most propane (LPG) stations do not have open dates. Some open dates are approximate. For electric vehicle charging stations added to the Station Locator through automated data feeds from charging networks, this is either the date provided by the charging network or the date it appeared in the Station Locator if the charging network does not provide an open date. See the

name: ev_connector_types
desc: For electric stations, an array of strings identifying the connector types available at this station. Valid connector types are:

name: country
desc: The two character country code of the station's location.

name: access_code
desc: A description of who is allowed to access the station, given as code values as described below:

name: access_detail_code
desc: A description of other station access information, given as code values as described below:

name: facility_type
desc: The type of facility at which the station is located, given as code values as described below:

name: ev_pricing
desc: For electric stations, information about whether and how much users must pay to use the EVSE port.

name: restricted_access
desc: For public stations, an indication of whether the station has restricted access, given as a boolean:
